title: Bay Area Welcome Map
name: Bay Area Welcome Map
description:
A Map by Fantasma

Some key places that might be helpful now that you're in the Bay Area.

properties.name: Ranch 99
properties.description: Posted by Fantasma3288 Pierce Street, Richmond, CAAsian Supermarket... has the best and cheapest fresh fish around. Also great for meats, but not good for other shopping. Located in the Pacific East Mall, right off the Freeway at Central.
